<Link id="l00008" /><CodeLine lineNumber="8"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00009" /><CodeLine lineNumber="9"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This pass modifies function signatures containing aggregate arguments</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00010" /><CodeLine lineNumber="10"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// and/or return value before IRTranslator. Information about the original</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00011" /><CodeLine lineNumber="11"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// signatures is stored in metadata. It is used during call lowering to</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00012" /><CodeLine lineNumber="12"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// restore correct SPIR-V types of function arguments and return values.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00013" /><CodeLine lineNumber="13"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This pass also substitutes some llvm intrinsic calls with calls to newly</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00014" /><CodeLine lineNumber="14"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// generated functions (as the Khronos LLVM/SPIR-V Translator does).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00015" /><CodeLine lineNumber="15"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00016" /><CodeLine lineNumber="16"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// NOTE: this pass is a module-level one due to the necessity to modify</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00017" /><CodeLine lineNumber="17"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// GVs/functions.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00018" /><CodeLine lineNumber="18"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00019" /><CodeLine lineNumber="19"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//===----------------------------------------------------------------------===//</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00197" /><CodeLine lineNumber="197"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Try to parse the annotation string according to the following rules:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00198" /><CodeLine lineNumber="198"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// annotation := (&#123;kind&#125; | &#123;kind:value,value,...&#125;)+</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00199" /><CodeLine lineNumber="199"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// kind := number</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00200" /><CodeLine lineNumber="200"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// value := number | string</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00201" /><CodeLine lineNumber="201"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> std::regex R(</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00202" /><CodeLine lineNumber="202"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;\\\\&#123;(\\\\d+)(?:&#91;:,&#93;(\\\\d+|\\&quot;&#91;^\\&quot;&#93;&#42;\\&quot;)(?:,(\\\\d+|\\&quot;&#91;^\\&quot;&#93;&#42;\\&quot;))&#42;)?\\\\&#125;&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00203" /><CodeLine lineNumber="203"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvector">SmallVector&lt;Metadata &#42;&gt;</a> MDs;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00204" /><CodeLine lineNumber="204"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Pos = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00205" /><CodeLine lineNumber="205"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (std::sregex&#95;iterator</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00206" /><CodeLine lineNumber="206"><span class="doxyHighlight">           It = std::sregex&#95;iterator(Anno.begin(), Anno.end(), R),</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00207" /><CodeLine lineNumber="207"><span class="doxyHighlight">           ItEnd = std::sregex&#95;iterator();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00208" /><CodeLine lineNumber="208"><span class="doxyHighlight">       It != ItEnd; ++It) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00209" /><CodeLine lineNumber="209"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (It-&gt;position() != Pos)</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00211" /><CodeLine lineNumber="211"><span class="doxyHighlight">    Pos = It-&gt;position() + It-&gt;length();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00212" /><CodeLine lineNumber="212"><span class="doxyHighlight">    std::smatch <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a313a633eb3049b90e931206183e1251ea6da89265a9a8b0b28eb4946bb2ec0c6d">Match</a> = &#42;It;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00216" /><CodeLine lineNumber="216"><span class="doxyHighlight">      std::string Item = SMatch.str();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00217" /><CodeLine lineNumber="217"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Item.length() == 0)</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00221" /><CodeLine lineNumber="221"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Acceptable format of the string snippet is:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00222" /><CodeLine lineNumber="222"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> std::regex RStr(</span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;^(\\\\d+)(?:,(\\\\d+))&#42;$&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00223" /><CodeLine lineNumber="223"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (std::smatch MatchStr; std::regex&#95;match(Item, MatchStr, RStr)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00224" /><CodeLine lineNumber="224"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (std::size&#95;t SubIdx = 1; SubIdx &lt; MatchStr.size(); ++SubIdx)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00225" /><CodeLine lineNumber="225"><span class="doxyHighlight">            </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (std::string SubStr = MatchStr&#91;SubIdx&#93;.str(); SubStr.length())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00226" /><CodeLine lineNumber="226"><span class="doxyHighlight">              MDsItem.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectortemplatebase/#af42bfbc067df27c19ee2fc859df58799">push&#95;back</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/constantasmetadata/#a4c720c398a263087e00d7358b05636d5">ConstantAsMetadata::get</a>(</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00228" /><CodeLine lineNumber="228"><span class="doxyHighlight">        &#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00315" /><CodeLine lineNumber="315"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (FSHIntrinsic-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/intrinsicinst/#a7ff64b3625b6f9020556ed05a5f72af4">getIntrinsicID</a>() == Intrinsic::fshr) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00316" /><CodeLine lineNumber="316"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Shift the less significant number right, the &quot;rotate&quot; number of bits</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00317" /><CodeLine lineNumber="317"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// will be 0-filled on the left as a result of this regular shift.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00318" /><CodeLine lineNumber="318"><span class="doxyHighlight">    FirstShift = IRB.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/irbuilderbase/#a5849d19e500f8c6713ec44889058f424">CreateLShr</a>(FSHFunc-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/function/#aecf2b6d6f052a378dd8f69fd1bb700b1">getArg</a>(1), RotateModVal);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00319" /><CodeLine lineNumber="319"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00320" /><CodeLine lineNumber="320"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Shift the more significant number left, the &quot;rotate&quot; number of bits</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00321" /><CodeLine lineNumber="321"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// will be 0-filled on the right as a result of this regular shift.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00322" /><CodeLine lineNumber="322"><span class="doxyHighlight">    FirstShift = IRB.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/irbuilderbase/#a9b6a3be6451cf6a789d9305d90751c40">CreateShl</a>(FSHFunc-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/function/#aecf2b6d6f052a378dd8f69fd1bb700b1">getArg</a>(0), RotateModVal);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00323" /><CodeLine lineNumber="323"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00324" /><CodeLine lineNumber="324"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We want the &quot;rotate&quot; number of the more significant int&#39;s LSBs (MSBs) to</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00325" /><CodeLine lineNumber="325"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// occupy the leftmost (rightmost) &quot;0 space&quot; left by the previous operation.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00326" /><CodeLine lineNumber="326"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Therefore, subtract the &quot;rotate&quot; number from the integer bitsize...</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00327" /><CodeLine lineNumber="327"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;SubRotateVal = IRB.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/irbuilderbase/#a92c83e803f2cf22906da0aaec44ff6d7">CreateSub</a>(BitWidthForInsts, RotateModVal);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00328" /><CodeLine lineNumber="328"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (FSHIntrinsic-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/intrinsicinst/#a7ff64b3625b6f9020556ed05a5f72af4">getIntrinsicID</a>() == Intrinsic::fshr) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00329" /><CodeLine lineNumber="329"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// ...and left-shift the more significant int by this number, zero-filling</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00330" /><CodeLine lineNumber="330"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the LSBs.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00331" /><CodeLine lineNumber="331"><span class="doxyHighlight">    SecShift = IRB.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/irbuilderbase/#a9b6a3be6451cf6a789d9305d90751c40">CreateShl</a>(FSHFunc-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/function/#aecf2b6d6f052a378dd8f69fd1bb700b1">getArg</a>(0), SubRotateVal);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00332" /><CodeLine lineNumber="332"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00333" /><CodeLine lineNumber="333"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// ...and right-shift the less significant int by this number, zero-filling</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00334" /><CodeLine lineNumber="334"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the MSBs.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00335" /><CodeLine lineNumber="335"><span class="doxyHighlight">    SecShift = IRB.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/irbuilderbase/#a5849d19e500f8c6713ec44889058f424">CreateLShr</a>(FSHFunc-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/function/#aecf2b6d6f052a378dd8f69fd1bb700b1">getArg</a>(1), SubRotateVal);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00336" /><CodeLine lineNumber="336"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00337" /><CodeLine lineNumber="337"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// A simple binary addition of the shifted ints yields the final result.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00338" /><CodeLine lineNumber="338"><span class="doxyHighlight">  IRB.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/irbuilderbase/#a5d0c52ee1cde6421f98c193e0e42b97d">CreateRet</a>(IRB.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/irbuilderbase/#ab61be8e3cf17e9848aeeeabacfa1b09a">CreateOr</a>(FirstShift, SecShift));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00339" /><CodeLine lineNumber="339"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00340" /><CodeLine lineNumber="340"><span class="doxyHighlight">  FSHIntrinsic-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/callbase/#aee56a5257c4899bf97c5957d87a732e3">setCalledFunction</a>(FSHFunc);</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00344" /><CodeLine lineNumber="344"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If we cannot use the SPV&#95;KHR&#95;expect&#95;assume extension, then we need to</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00345" /><CodeLine lineNumber="345"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// ignore the intrinsic and move on. It should be removed later on by LLVM.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00346" /><CodeLine lineNumber="346"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Otherwise we should lower the intrinsic to the corresponding SPIR-V</span></CodeLine>
